MongoDB

MongoDB

A document based database. Basically a bunch of nested json documents

The database, shell and mongoose

To run the mongoDB install from here. But to actually interact with it you need to use the shell or mongoose. Most of the time you won't be hosting the mongoDB on your webserver. Rather it's served somewhere. 

install the mongo shell here

  • see notes for mongoose here
